bibl.title: Letter from Joseph A. LePrince to Henry Rose Carter, July 16, 1925

div1.p: LePrince describes the work of Fisher in Alabama and compares it with work in Virginia. He includes diagrams.

div1.head: Letter from Joseph A. LePrince to Henry Rose Carter, July 16, 1925
div1.opener:
MONTGOMERY'S NEWEST HOTEL
The Whitley
CIRCULATING ICE WATER
MONTGOMERY, ALA.
156 Rooms
119 Baths
Tub & Showers
PROPERTY
N.J. BELL, ESTATE
A.B. CANSLER, MGR.
July 16/25
Dear Dr Carter-
div1.p:
Possibly Mr Fisher
has written you re his work
He has devised a strainer
bottom metal container
in which he dumps his larvae
from a dipper- He merely puts
a layer of cotton on the strainer
and when the lid is kept on the
larvae line for a day or more-

Ive had him busy on
study of attractivity of small
caves in earthern vertical
walls or small cliffs for
anopheles- These caves
seem to attract crucians
(2
MONTGOMERY'S NEWEST HOTEL
The Whitley
CIRCULATING ICE WATER
MONTGOMERY, ALA.
156 Rooms
119 Baths
Tub & Showers
PROPERTY
N.J. BELL, ESTATE
A.B. CANSLER, MGR.
away from other nearby
resting places such as rootlets
of overhanging banks-

But if rootlets hang down
from the roof of a small
earth cave (say 12"x12"x12")
nearly all of the crucians
rest on these rootlets in the
cave-

On the other hand in
similar small man made
“caveletts” in Virginia with
the roofs having roots hanging
down, in the absence of
crucians 100% of the quads
rest on the earth walls or
earth roof- Of course
other observations are
(3
MONTGOMERY'S NEWEST HOTEL
The Whitley
CIRCULATING ICE WATER
MONTGOMERY, ALA.
156 Rooms
119 Baths
Tub & Showers
PROPERTY
N.J. BELL, ESTATE
A.B. CANSLER, MGR.
needed to see if this always
holds good (or if generally)

Im having J. C Carter
make some holes a hundred
yards from a quad pond
near Montgomery-
Plan View
cave
cave
Pit
cave
cave
Sectional
View
cave
Pit
(4
MONTGOMERY'S NEWEST HOTEL
The Whitley
CIRCULATING ICE WATER
MONTGOMERY, ALA.
156 Rooms
119 Baths
Tub & Showers
PROPERTY
N.J. BELL, ESTATE
A.B. CANSLER, MGR.
in a sum exposed place as
well as in a tree shaded place
(quads
to see whether they will collect
quads & in case of shade, if
they can induce quads to leave
tree trunks, logs etc & go into
man made holes prepared
for them as we found in
the S. C. experiment the A. C
did-

What Im driving at is
to see if we can get 80 to 95%
of A. C. & A. Q to collect
in day time in the exact
places we wish them to
collect in.-

MONTGOMERY'S NEWEST HOTEL
The Whitley
CIRCULATING ICE WATER
MONTGOMERY, ALA.

If this can be done - then
the next step 3 is to so arrange
that all that go in never
come out- Like the Isle
of Lilipoton? in the
Opera Mme Angot?

There may be possibilities
& I think it is worth
going into-

With best wishes to
you & Miss Laura
